amendment.description: Amendment strikes language in the bill which targets immigrant integration grants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for immigrant intergration grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Honda amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Honda amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Honda.
